mapper.update: update t_product_order set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_mode = #{productMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_no = #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select user_no, user_id, product_mode, product_id, staff_id, channel_id from t_product_order

SELECT COUNT(0) devAmount, sum(order_amount) totalTurnover, sum(order_amount)/30 dayTurnover FROM t_product_order WHERE channel_id IN ( SELECT channel_id FROM t_channel_info WHERE city_code = ( SELECT area_id FROM t_area_info WHERE area_name like concat('%',#{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ) ) and order_date like CONCAT('%',#{orderDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
SELECT COUNT(0) devAmount, sum(order_amount) totalTurnover, sum(order_amount)/30 dayTurnover from t_product_order where order_date like CONCAT('%',#{orderDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select i.product_name, o.month, o.sum, o.last_month, o.last_sum from t_product_info i, ( select a.product_id, month(str_to_date(order_date, '%Y%m%d')) as month,sum(convert(order_amount, decimal(10,2))) as sum, last_month, last_sum from t_product_order a, ( select month(str_to_date(order_date, '%Y%m%d')) as last_month, product_id, sum(convert(order_amount, decimal(10,2))) as last_sum from t_product_order where month(str_to_date(order_date, '%Y%m%d')) = month(date_sub(now(), interval 1 month )) group by product_id ) b where month(str_to_date(order_date, '%Y%m%d'))=month(now()) and a.product_id = b.product_id group by product_id ) o where i.product_id = o.product_id

SELECT T2.area_name areaName,count(*) totalAmount FROM t_product_order T3,( #获取到渠道编码信息 SELECT channel_id,T1.area_name FROM t_channel_info , ( #查询该名称单位下的所有下一级子区域的ID SELECT area_id,area_name FROM t_area_info WHERE parent_id IN ( #模糊查询该名称区域的ID信息取第一条记录 SELECT area_id FROM t_area_info WHERE area_name LIKE '${_parameter}%' ) ) T1 WHERE province_code =T1.area_id ) T2 WHERE T3.channel_id =T2.channel_id GROUP BY T2.area_name order BY count(*) desc

SELECT T2.area_name areaName,sum(order_amount) totalIncome FROM t_product_order T3,( #获取到渠道编码信息 SELECT channel_id,T1.area_name FROM t_channel_info , ( #查询该名称单位下的所有下一级子区域的ID SELECT area_id,area_name FROM t_area_info WHERE parent_id IN ( #模糊查询该名称区域的ID信息取第一条记录 SELECT area_id FROM t_area_info WHERE area_name LIKE '${_parameter}%' ) ) T1 WHERE province_code =T1.area_id ) T2 WHERE T3.channel_id =T2.channel_id GROUP BY T2.area_name order BY sum(order_amount) desc
